SongName: Stay The Night (Zedd & Kevin Drew Extended Remix)
Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:30.50]I know that we are upside down
[00:32.66]
[00:33.83]So hold your tongue and hear me out
[00:36.88]
[00:37.53]I know that we were made to break
[00:40.47]
[00:40.69]So what? I don't mind
[00:44.42]
[00:45.35]You kill the lights,
[00:46.35]
[00:46.61]So draw the blinds
[00:48.39]
[00:48.99]Don't dull the sparkle in your eyes
[00:52.14]
[00:52.60]I know that we were made to break
[00:55.31]
[00:55.59]So what? I don't mind
[00:59.29]
[01:00.43]Are you gonna stay the night?
[01:03.11]
[01:03.81]Are you gonna stay the night?
[01:06.55]
[01:07.51]Oh oh oh,
[01:10.42]
[01:10.70]are you gonna stay the night?
[01:14.81]
[01:15.37]Are you gonna stay the night?
[01:18.19]
[01:18.90]Doesn't mean we're bound for life
[01:22.09]
[01:22.50]So oh oh oh,
[01:25.29]
[01:25.69]are you gonna stay the night?
[01:30.10]
[02:00.42]I am a fire, you're gasoline,
[02:02.81]
[02:03.82]Come pour yourself all over me
[02:06.72]
[02:07.58]We'll let this place go down in flames
[02:10.40]
[02:10.68]only one more time
[02:14.36]
[02:15.35]You kill the lights, So draw the blinds
[02:18.16]
[02:18.90]Don't dull the sparkle in your eyes
[02:22.02]
[02:22.69]I know that we were made to break
[02:25.24]
[02:25.55]So what? I don't mind
[02:29.41]
[02:30.48]Are you gonna stay the night?
[02:33.09]
[02:33.65]Are you gonna stay the night?
[02:36.90]
[02:37.61]Oh oh oh, are you gonna stay the night?
[02:44.69]
[02:45.48]Are you gonna stay the night? (we get burned!)
[02:48.71]Doesn't mean we're bound for life (we never learn!)
[02:52.60]So oh oh, are you gonna stay the night?
[02:59.36]
[02:59.70]Night night night night night...
[03:11.07]Are you gonna stay the night?
[03:14.86]
[03:45.37]Are you gonna stay the night?
[03:48.25]
[03:48.96]Doesn't mean we're bound for life
[03:52.00]
[03:52.71]So oh oh, are you gonna stay the night?
[03:59.65]
[04:00.02]Night,night,night……
[04:11.23]Are you gonna stay the night?
[04:14.72]
[04:48.79]
